api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://free-youtube-video-downloader.p.rapidapi.com/popular"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "free-youtube-video-downloader.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://free-youtube-video-downloader.p.rapidapi.com/popular"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "free-youtube-video-downloader.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

optional_parameters.name: fields
optional_parameters.description: All endpoints that return a JSON body support the fields API for specifying desired fields to reduce bandwidth consumption. This can be used by adding &fields=FIELDS with the desired fields, for example fields=videoId,title,description&pretty=1.
